Logic/Notes: Field name contains "state" - converted to uppercase 3-letter format (VIC
Field name contains "land cost" - ONLY populate if split contract property (formData.decisionTree?.contractTypeSimplified === 'Split Contract')
Field name contains "build cost" - ONLY populate if split contract property (formData.decisionTree?.contractTypeSimplified === 'Split Contract')
Field name contains "total cost" - Use totalPrice field (same field for both single and split contracts - for split contracts it's calculated as land + build and shown as greyed out)
Field name contains "cashback value" - ONLY populate if contractType is '01_hl_comms' OR '02_single_comms' OR '03_internal_with_comms' AND cashbackRebateType === 'cashback'
Field name contains "total bed" - If dual occupancy (formData.decisionTree?.dualOccupancy === 'Yes'): return "bedsPrimary + bedsSecondary"
Field name contains "total bath" - If dual occupancy (formData.decisionTree?.dualOccupancy === 'Yes'): return "bathPrimary + bathSecondary"
Field name contains "total garage" - If dual occupancy (formData.decisionTree?.dualOccupancy === 'Yes'): return "garagePrimary + garageSecondary"
Field name contains "low rent" - If dual occupancy AND rentAppraisalSecondaryFrom > 0: return sum of rentAppraisalPrimaryFrom + rentAppraisalSecondaryFrom
Field name contains "high rent" - If dual occupancy AND rentAppraisalSecondaryTo > 0: return sum of rentAppraisalPrimaryTo + rentAppraisalSecondaryTo
